Uses of Package
com.github.macgregor.alexandria

  • Packages that use com.github.macgregor.alexandria 
    Package Description
    com.github.macgregor.alexandria  
    com.github.macgregor.alexandria.exceptions  
    com.github.macgregor.alexandria.remotes  
  • Classes in com.github.macgregor.alexandria used by com.github.macgregor.alexandria 
    Class and Description
    Alexandria
    Core class for saving, loading and processing documents.
    AlexandriaConvert
    Converts indexed documents from markdown to html.
    AlexandriaIndex
    Process files into metadata for tracking, identifying un-indexed files and adding them to Config.metadata.
    AlexandriaSync
    Sync indexed documents with the configured remote.
    BatchProcess
    Generic class to handle wrapping batch processing in robust error handling.
    BatchProcess.AfterBatch
    Lambda compatible interface that will be called after processing is complete
    BatchProcess.Batch
    Lambda compatible interface that will collect objects to be processed
    BatchProcess.Task
    Lambda compatible interface that will process each object returned by BatchProcess.Batch.collect(Context).
    Config
    Alexandria configuration that should be persisted between runs.
    Config.DocumentMetadata
    Metadata used to index a document for tracking and syncing purposes.
    Config.DocumentMetadata.State
    Simple enum to provide type checked states for document processing.
    Config.RemoteConfig
    Configuration properties for instantiating and configuring a Remote.
    Context
    Runtime context containing arguments passed from the user agent (e.g.
    PathFinder
    Find files along a set of directories that based on include/exclude patterns.
    PathFinder.GlobFileFilter
    File filter that matches glob patterns against absolute file paths.
  • Classes in com.github.macgregor.alexandria used by com.github.macgregor.alexandria.exceptions 
    Class and Description
    Config.DocumentMetadata
    Metadata used to index a document for tracking and syncing purposes.
